CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 25, 1966, pg. 1B, reads: "Father and Son - When he is not on the baseball field, Priate [Pirate] slugger Roberto Clemente is home playing with his son. He is starting to teach him early how to play with a ball. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Roberto Clemente and his son Roberto Clemente Jr. seated on floor, in their apartment in East Liberty
